channel.title: Hugo on Prasanth Janardhanan
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Prasanth Janardhanan

item.title: Build a very fast, highly customizable static website using Hugo in less than 10 minutes
item.description: Hugo is a fast static website builder written in Go language. The advantage of static sites is that the site can be hosted easily since it does not require any server-side scripting like PHP, Ruby, or a database like MySql. Static sites are very fast since there is very little server-side processing involved. Most importantly, there are several platforms where you can host your website for Free! That’s right, absolute 0 monthly costs.
